alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 10:36PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FOR COASTAL AREAS OF SAN LUIS OBISPO AND WESTERN SANTA BARBARA COUNTIES... ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY CANCELED FOR THE SANTA BARBARA SOUTH COAST AND THE CHANNEL ISLANDS... ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FOR COASTAL AREAS OF SAN LUIS OBISPO AND WESTERN SANTA BARBARA COUNTIES... ** UPDATES... Tsunami surging continues to be reported for coastal locations in San Luis Obispo and Western Santa Barbara counties. ** LOCAL IMPACTs... A tsunami capable of producing strong currents that may be hazardous to swimmers, boats, and coastal structures will continue. Widespread inundation is NOT expected. * RECOMMENDED ACTIONS... If you are located in this coastal area, move off the beach and out of harbors and marinas. Do not go to the coast to watch the tsunami. Be alert to instructions from your local emergency officials * REPORTED PEAK TSUNAMI WAVE HEIGHTS... Port San Luis California 0914 AM PST.....4.5 feet Santa Barbara California 0320 PM PST.....2.3 feet Tsunamis often arrive as a series of waves or surges which could be dangerous for many hours after the first wave arrival. The first tsunami wave or surge may not be the highest in the series. * PRELIMINARY EARTHQUAKE INFORMATION... At 827 PM PST on Jan 14 2022, a large volcanic eruption occurred near the Tonga Islands in the South Pacific. * TIDE INFORMATION... Port San Luis...High tide of 5.8 ft at 818 AM PST on Jan 16. Low tide of -0.7 ft at 350 PM PST on Jan 16. Santa Barbara...High tide of 5.8 ft at 800 AM PST on Jan 16. Low tide of -0.8 ft at 330 PM PST on Jan 16. This product will be updated as new information becomes available. Stay tuned to your local news source and NOAA weather radio for further information and updates.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast
